description:
Whether you're on your daily commute or touring around wine country from vineyard to vineyard, the Classic Saddle provides comfortable support to keep you going. The central cut-out keeps the pressure low on soft tissues, so you can focus on the scenery around you.

  • Nylon base is supportive and provides some flex for comfort
  • Light and high-density foam are mapped to spread pressure evenly
  • Chromoly rails are light and durable
  • Central cut-out reduces pressure on soft tissues
name: MEC Classic Saddle - Women's
